website_summaries.verdict: Users haven't found much to complain about with this product apart from its price.
pros: Lathers nicely, so you don't have to use a lot at once
cons: More expensive than some of the other products on this list

customer_reviews.title: fresh and clean
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 4-5 years, with the pump it lasts a long time,. The scent is fresh but not overpowering, just clean smelling. I like the subtle scent and the fresh clean feeling from washing with this. I recommend this fine body to anybody who enjoys the light scernt of rosemary/mint
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So good. So dang expensive
customer_reviews.text: I love Aveda products. Especially their body washes. I just wish they weren't so freakin expensive. I can't always afford them but if I have a little extra cash, I always buy Aveda.
customer_reviews.author: chompy_jr

customer_reviews.title: Great for Soldiers, too.
customer_reviews.text: I am a Soldier athlete. This is an incredible product on all fronts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Minty scent
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, minty.. Leaves skin clean but not drying out.. A little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Stu Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Broken top/product leaked out
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when it arrived. The top/cap was cracked and broken and barely twisted on , and there was dried up body wash that had leaked out and was on the sides of the bottle. Just would have expected it to be packaged better after spending $80 on body wash. I do love the product itself though, just disappointed with the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Kally VanCleve

customer_reviews.title: Aveda bdy wwash
customer_reviews.text: Kids pricey, but a great product. Delivery was slower than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tomfred

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love this price and love this body wash, checked in a local shop and for the small container they wanted $70+, this is a great deal and love the smell and feel of this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Stein

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a wonderful scent. Even makes bubbles in the tub!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen from Montello

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: The minute I tried this product I immediately went online in search to buy it. It's like a spa retreat after every shower. I never experienced anything like it. t is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Don't understand all the good reviews
customer_reviews.text: For me, this is just a body wash. The scent is mild, I feel no magic refreshness, and don't understand some of the comments peopled raved about. High cost. Perhaps people are experiencing the placebo affect with the name?? I do use the Men's shampoo and like it. The body wash, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Bachelor Man

customer_reviews.title: A product I love
customer_reviews.text: We have used the Rosemary Mint wash for many years. The fragrance is wonderful for the bathroom, and the concentration of the product means you use very little each hand wash. We do not find it hard on the hands at all, and it is used many times each day located at both bathroom sinks.
customer_reviews.author: SD of MN

customer_reviews.title: Something's wrong
customer_reviews.text: Not the original formula. Either I received a counterfeit or Aveda changed the formulation to an inferior one. The body wash has a different look and the smell does not last on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Q.

customer_reviews.title: Not What She Remembered
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife. She discovered the product on a vacation in our hotel and really liked it. When she used it this time, she felt that it left her skin much more dried out than other body washes she has used in the past. She did not recall that problem when she first used it on vacation. It is possible this is not the common occurrence for everyone, but it is what she experienced on multiple trials with this particular order.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Aveda Mint body wash
customer_reviews.text: Love the fragrance of the body wash and the way it makes my skin feel soft and refreshed.. ..
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous price
customer_reviews.text: $70.00 for one bottle of body wash? They cannot be serious. We have used the product over many years but they have priced themselves out of any reasonable consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I do like Aveda products. However, the quality of this product is mixed. Sometimes I've purchased a bottle and it's been fine... great refreshing aroma. Other times (about 50%), it just plain STINKS! Sort of rancid, or bitter smelling. I do believe that they have either a production problem, or a serious issue with shelf life. Unfortunately, I have decided that the cost is far too high to continue purchasing an unreliable product.
customer_reviews.author: Melsden

product_meta.title: Aveda Rosemary Mint Hand and Body Wash 33.8oz Cleansing Lets You Wash Frequently Without Over Drying
product_meta.description: Come alive in an instant with gentle cleansing and the invigorating aroma of rosemary and peppermint. Gentle cleansing formula balances skin's moisture so you can wash frequently without over-drying. Awakens the senses with an invigorating aroma of certified organic rosemary and peppermint with other pure flower and plant essences
